# *(_:_:)

**Operator**

Returns the concatenation of a pose and a scaled pose.

## Declaration

```swift
static func * (lhs: Pose3D, rhs: ScaledPose3D) -> ScaledPose3D
```

## Applying arithmetic operations

- ***(_:_:)**: Returns the concatenation of two scaled poses.
- ***(_:_:)**: Returns the concatenation of a scaled pose and a pose.
- ***=(_:_:)**: Concatenates two scaled poses and stores the result in the left-hand-side variable.

items.description: Returns the concatenation of two scaled poses.
Returns the concatenation of a scaled pose and a pose.
Concatenates two scaled poses and stores the result in the left-hand-side variable.
